title: Exhibition in our own home
body:
In the third DIY art and music event from the South Manchester-based collective you are all invited once more into our home for an interactive experience and community gathering.

The Picture House with Come Together Collective is a moving image exhibition and screening event featuring an eclectic range of work from local artists.

The Picture House with Come Together Collective is a moving image exhibition and screening event featuring an eclectic range of work from local artists.
